H0.text: Which motor scooter had a name meaning ‘wasp’. Honda Buzz

H1.text: Which motor scooter had a name meaning ‘wasp’. Aprilia Wasp

H2.text: Which motor scooter had a name meaning ‘wasp’. Peugeot Pulsion

H3.text: Which motor scooter had a name meaning ‘wasp’. Vespa

A4.text: Vespa is both Latin and Italian for wasp—derived from the vehicle's body shape: the thicker rear part connected to the front part by a narrow waist, and the steering rod resembled antennae.
